mechanism: Works by increasing serotonin levels in the brain, which may help improve mood and reduce anxiety.
whatYouMightNotice: Some people notice gradual mood improvements over several weeks
May help reduce anxiety and intrusive thoughts
Can sometimes affect sleep patterns initially
mentalHealthLinks: Often used to support mood stability and reduce anxiety
Consistency with timing can help maintain steady levels
safetyNote: Educational only. Not medical advice. Discuss changes with your clinician.
